duties_responsibilities.duty: Carrying out key laboratory tasks and experiments related to the novel technique of semiconducting carbon nanotubes (CNTs) for computational and communication devices.
Fabricating samples for internal and collaboration/customer testing and preparing summary reports on lab samples and results.
Overseeing test equipment operation, interpreting and validating results, and compiling materials parameters, characterization results, and device performance data.
Communicating clearly with the technical team and supporting the development of EHS policies and procedures.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering or Chemistry (Engineering major in Chemical, Materials, Mechanical, or Electrical Engineering preferred)
